1010101101011100 1001001001001101 1 -> sum: 0011110110101010, cout: 1
1101110000010001 1010100000001000 0 -> sum: 1000010000011001, cout: 1
1110101001101000 0010001101100101 1 -> sum: 0000110111001110, cout: 1
0100111000011110 0101000001011010 0 -> sum: 1001111001111000, cout: 0
1001010100101100 0000010110111001 0 -> sum: 1001101011100101, cout: 0
1110000010000011 0101001101100111 1 -> sum: 0011001111101011, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
